sentences.english: Or the time I sent that late night email to my ex-girlfriend that we should get back together.
sentences.chinese: 或者我在深夜给前女友发邮件，希望我们能重修旧好。

sentences.english: Separation from his girl-friend made him sad.
sentences.chinese: 与女友的分离使他很伤心。

sentences.english: Steve borrowed his dad's sports car to impress his girlfriend.
sentences.chinese: 史蒂夫借来他爸爸的跑车以讨得女友欢心。

sentences.english: Two girlfriends and I piled into a car and headed to Aspen, Colo.
sentences.chinese: 我和两个女友挤进一辆车，驰向科罗拉多的阿斯彭。

sentences.english: And you're talking about your relationship with your boyfriend or girlfriend.
sentences.chinese: 你们正在讨论自己跟男友或者女友的关系。

sentences.english: Conson your present happy ghost, meet a new girlfriend Annie.
sentences.chinese: 开心鬼的今世康森贵，结识了新女友安妮。

sentences.english: His lawyer said Underwood had gone to see his girlfriend and wanted to finish a domestic argument.
sentences.chinese: 他的律师替他辩护道，他是去找女友了，想把架吵完。

sentences.english: I used to come here all the time with my ex.
sentences.chinese: 我以前经常跟我前女友来这儿。

sentences.english: The "girlfriend startled has stayed, is looking boyfriend's back, felt extremely despairs."
sentences.chinese: 女友惊呆了，望着男友的背影，感到非常绝望。

sentences.english: Now I'm single and I have no friends. FML
sentences.chinese: 而现在，我一个人孤苦伶仃，没有女友也没有朋友。

sentences.english: It was embarrassing for him to bump into one of his ex- girlfriends last night.
sentences.chinese: 昨天晚上撞见其中一个前女友真是让他尴尬。

sentences.english: My Girlfriend is a Gumiho. E02.
He will teach you how to deel with your girlfriend or lover.
sentences.chinese: 他教你如何和女友或情人相处。

sentences.english: My girlfriend and I are habitual cinema-goers.
sentences.chinese: 电影观众我和女友是电影院的常客。

sentences.english: Assange fathered him in his teens with his then-girlfriend.
sentences.chinese: 阿桑格与他当时的女友在十几岁时就当上了爹妈。

definition: to part company/to split up/to break up
the bride's side (of a wedding)/of the bride's party
